item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 29, 2025 at 4:20 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Plain – a web framework for building products with Python (8 points | discuss)

10. xAI has acquired X, xAI now valued at $80B (489 points | 560 comments)

15. Decomposing a Factorial into Large Factors (102 points | 23 comments)

22. I asked police to send me their public surveillance footage of my car (536 points | 424 comments)
23. Building a modern durable execution engine from first principles (69 points | 17 comments)

25. MilliForth-6502: The smallest Forth real programming language for 6502 (101 points | 29 comments)
26. Madison Square Garden's surveillance banned this fan over his T-shirt design (75 points | 20 comments)

28. Building Statically Linked Go Executables with CGO and Zig (110 points | 15 comments)
29. Superhyperbola (47 points | 14 comments)
30. Plasmonic Modulators Can Break the Wireless Terahertz Barrier (13 points | 8 comments)
